headline: Analyst Maintains ‘Equal Weight’ Rating on PG&E Corporation (PCG), Price Target Reduced
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is included among the 11 Best Utility Stocks to Invest in According to Hedge Funds. PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) provides natural gas and electric service to residential and business customers in northern and central California. On December 16, Morgan Stanley slightly cut its price target on PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) from $21 to $20, […]
